text: The International Alliance of Research Universities (IARU) was a program launched in January 2006 as a leading co-operative network of 10 international research-intensive universities. The president of the IARU is Australian National University Vice-Chancellor Professor Ian Chubb. Its members are: * Australian National University * University of Cambridge * University of Oxford * University of California, Berkeley * Yale University * Peking University * National University of Singapore * University of Tokyo * University of Copenhagen * ETH Zurich Category:2006 establishments Category:International scientific organizations Category:Educational organizations
title: International Alliance of Research Universities
